Namespace: MilkShake
Assembly: Assembly-CSharp.dll
Syntax
[AddComponentMenu("MilkShake/Shaker")]
public class Shaker : MonoBehaviour

Fields

| Improve this Doc View Source

GlobalShakers

A static list of Shakers. Shakers are added to this list on Awake if Add To Global Shakers is set to true.

Declaration
public static List<Shaker> GlobalShakers
Field Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<Shaker>

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddShake(ShakeInstance)

Adds an already existing ShakeInstance to this Shaker's active shakes.

Declaration
public void AddShake(ShakeInstance shakeInstance)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ShakeInstance shakeInstance

The ShakeInstance to add.

AddShakeAll(ShakeInstance)

Adds an already existing ShakeInstance to all global shakers.

Declaration
public static void AddShakeAll(ShakeInstance shakeInstance)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ShakeInstance shakeInstance

The ShakeInstance to add.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Shake(IShakeParameters, Nullable<Int32>)

Starts a shake.

Declaration
public ShakeInstance Shake(IShakeParameters shakeData, int? seed = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IShakeParameters shakeData

The shake parameters such as strength and roughness and fade in/out times.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> seed

An optional seed to use for the shake. Shakes that have the same seed will have the same movement.
Returns
Type Description
ShakeInstance

A ShakeInstance which can be used to stop the shake or modify the shake parameters.
| Improve this Doc View Source

ShakeAll(IShakeParameters, Nullable<Int32>)

Shakes all global Shakers. Note that all shakers will get the same ShakeInstance, and thus will have the same shake movement.

Declaration
public static ShakeInstance ShakeAll(IShakeParameters shakeData, int? seed = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IShakeParameters shakeData

The shake parameters such as strength, roughness and fade in/out times.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> seed

An optional seed to use for the shake. Shakes that have the same seed will have the same movement.
Returns
Type Description
ShakeInstance

A single ShakeInstance that all global shakers will be using for the shake. Modifying this will change it for all shakers.
| Improve this Doc View Source

ShakeAllFromPoint(Vector3, Single, IShakeParameters, List<ShakeInstance>, Nullable<Int32>)

Starts a shake for all Global Shakers, using a position and distance to scale the strength of the shake. If the distance between the shaker and the point is greater than the max distance, no shake will be applied.

Declaration
public static void ShakeAllFromPoint(Vector3 point, float maxDistance, IShakeParameters shakeData, List<ShakeInstance> shakeInstances = null, int? seed = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 point

The poisition that the shake originated from.
System.Single maxDistance

The maximum distance the shake should have an affect.
IShakeParameters shakeData

The shake parameters such as strength and roughness and fade in/out times.
System.Collections.Generic.List<ShakeInstance> shakeInstances

An optional list that will be populated with all of the created ShakeInstances.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> seed

A optional seed to use for the shake. Shakes that have the same seed will have the same movement.
| Improve this Doc View Source

ShakeAllSeparate(IShakeParameters, List<ShakeInstance>, Nullable<Int32>)

Shakes all global Shakers, using a separate ShakeInstance for each Shaker.

Declaration
public static void ShakeAllSeparate(IShakeParameters shakeData, List<ShakeInstance> shakeInstances = null, int? seed = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IShakeParameters shakeData

The shake parameters such as strength, roughness and fade in/out times.
System.Collections.Generic.List<ShakeInstance> shakeInstances

An optional list that will be populated with all of the created ShakeInstances.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> seed

An optional seed to use for the shake. Shakes that have the same seed will have the same movement.
| Improve this Doc View Source

ShakeFromPoint(Vector3, Single, IShakeParameters, Nullable<Int32>)

Starts a shake, using a position and distance to scale the strength of the shake. If the distance between this Shaker and the point is greater than the max distance, no shake will be applied.

Declaration
public ShakeInstance ShakeFromPoint(Vector3 point, float maxDistance, IShakeParameters shakeData, int? seed = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 point

The poisition that the shake originated from.
System.Single maxDistance

The maximum distance the shake should have an affect.
IShakeParameters shakeData

The shake parameters such as strength and roughness and fade in/out times.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> seed

A optional seed to use for the shake. Shakes that have the same seed will have the same movement.
Returns
Type Description
ShakeInstance

A ShakeInstance which can be used to stop the shake or modify the shake parameters. If the distance between this Shaker and the point is greater than the max distance, null will be returned.
